Message:
I...feel as though I just
woke up from a dream...
What was it...?
I can’t remember a thing...

It felt so important,
but when I try to
reach out my hand for it,
it collapses like a castle of sand...
As though it never existed
in the first place...

I have the ability to see
the power hidden in others.

I don’t remember when
I first gained this power.
Though, it feels like it was
a long time ago now...

That reminds me...
Since when was I able to
send off my pupils with
a smile like this?

I used to only ever wish
for them to be safe,
and come back alive...

Hmm...
Well, since it slipped
my mind, I guess
it wasn’t important!

Anyway, I wonder
what kind of girl
Illya has grown up to be!
I can’t wait to see her
again and find out!
